document_data.name: Youthful Mamluk Society
document_data.mainbody: The '''Youthful Mamluk Society''', who were also known as '''the Youthful''', was a military organization composed of [[mamluk]]s based in the [[Free Cities of Zakhara|Free City]] of [[Hafayah]] in [[north Zakhara]].
document_data.Organization: Twelve hundred mamluks, broken down into two 600â€“man units, formed the Youthful Mamluk Society.
